creator: Beat+
descriptionHtml:
Wanna earn rewards with surveys and make the world a greener place?

Survey App & Plant App: Earn rewards with Jagger. We plant a tree with every survey you take!

JAGGER WANTS A GREEN WORLD
HOW? It uses the revenue from your anonymous survey data to plant trees and to push for a cleaner and greener planet.

WHY JAGGER
- #1 Combined Survey App & Plant App
- It’s fun, it pays, and it’s 100% free to join
- Participate in online surveys and earn rewards, like gift cards and coupons
- Our brand partners will pay for anonymised survey, opinion & poll data
- Earn rewards while planting trees (1 survey = 1 tree) / Grow your own forest!
- Plant a tree and help the planet by actively stopping deforestation and rebuilding natural ecosystems
- Win & Earn: You get rewards from polls, surveys & advertising studies, and we contribute to a better and greener world
-----
HOW IT WORKS
1) Download the app & fill out your profile to qualify
2) Participate in short surveys & polls for Jagger Coins
3) Convert your Jagger Coins into Amazon vouchers and many other gift cards
4) We reinvest the profit into planting trees

FEATURES
- Fetching for available paid surveys every minute
- Earn Jagger Coins from surveys & polls
- Convert Jagger Coins into gift cards

MY JAGGER COINS
- Amazon gift card
- Xbox gift card
- Netflix gift card
- Google Play gift card
- iTunes gift card
- And many other retailers…
- Paypal credit (COMING SOON)
-----
REWARDS GROW ON TREES
Jagger is not only a survey app, it’s a transparent global initiative trusted by the world’s biggest brands (Google, Mars, McDonald’s, Gilette, Pepsi, Warner Bros, Pampers, or Specsavers among many others). Global brands believe in Jagger and quality users like YOURSELF, to learn about your TV, radio, and outdoor advertising preferences.
By joining Jagger's green journey through paid surveys, you'll be able to become a "tree advocate"!

EARN A REWARD & PLANT A TREE
→ Our ultimate goal is to plant 100 million trees in the next 5 years.
→ We want to make the world a GREENER PLACE by creating solutions that inspire other companies to fundamentally change the way they operate.
→ We decided to be the first ones to bring an altruistic and genuinely caring side to the survey and rewards app industry.
→ With the desire to be seen by users as more than the typical money, cash, rewards, gift cards, coupons and easy PayPal cashout app. With Jagger, we chose to create a platform that allows YOU to make the world a green and eco-friendly place by planting a tree for every survey taken.

PRIVACY POLICY
- Forests need protecting, and so does your privacy. Participating is 100% privacy-safe and completely anonymous.
- Profile data pseudonymised and securely stored with bank-level encryption
- We never sell your Personal Identifiable Information
- The app complies with CCPA & GDPR
- You are in control: Opt-out at any time.

SUPPORT
- If you have questions, please check the FAQ for questions about payments, winner announcements, new surveys available, or how the point system works.
- In case of technical problems or to submit suggestions and ideas, send us an email 💬 at support@beatplus.com 📧
- Use support platform https://support.jaggerapp.com/hc/en-us

Join us and start taking surveys and planting trees right now!

title: Jagger: Paid Surveys for Cash

creator: Beat+
descriptionHtml:
Want to earn rewards with surveys and make the world a greener place?

Survey App & Plant App: Earn rewards with Jagger. We plant a tree with every survey you take!

JAGGER WANTS A GREEN WORLD
HOW? It uses the revenue from your anonymous survey data to plant trees and to push for a cleaner and greener planet.

WHY JAGGER
- It's Paid Survey App and a Plant App that promotes environmental sustainability
- It’s fun, it pays, and it’s 100% free to join
- Participate in online surveys and earn rewards, like gift cards and coupons
- Our brand partners will pay for anonymised survey, opinion & poll data
- Earn rewards while planting trees (1 survey = 1 tree) / Grow your own forest!
- Plant a tree and help the planet by actively stopping deforestation and rebuilding natural ecosystems
- Win & Earn: You get rewards from polls, surveys & advertising studies, and we contribute to a better and greener world
-----
HOW IT WORKS
1) Download the app & fill out your profile to qualify
2) Participate in short surveys & polls for Jagger Coins
3) Convert your Jagger Coins into Amazon vouchers and many other gift cards
4) We reinvest the profit into planting trees

FEATURES
- Fetching for available paid surveys every minute
- Earn Jagger Coins from surveys & polls
- Convert Jagger Coins into gift cards

MY JAGGER COINS
- Amazon gift card
- Xbox gift card
- Netflix gift card
- Google Play gift card
- iTunes gift card
- And many other retailers…
- Paypal credit (COMING SOON)
-----
REWARDS GROW ON TREES
Jagger is not only a survey app, it’s a transparent global initiative trusted by the world’s biggest brands (Google, Mars, McDonald’s, Gilette, Pepsi, Warner Bros, Pampers, or Specsavers among many others). Global brands believe in Jagger and quality users like YOURSELF, to learn about your TV, radio, and outdoor advertising preferences.
By joining Jagger's green journey through paid surveys, you'll be able to become a "tree advocate"!

EARN A REWARD & PLANT A TREE
→ Our ultimate goal is to plant 100 million trees in the next 5 years.
→ We want to make the world a GREENER PLACE by creating solutions that inspire other companies to fundamentally change the way they operate.
→ We decided to be the first ones to bring an altruistic and genuinely caring side to the survey and rewards app industry.
→ With the desire to be seen by users as more than the typical money, cash, rewards, gift cards, coupons and easy PayPal cashout app. With Jagger, we chose to create a platform that allows YOU to make the world a green and eco-friendly place by planting a tree for every survey taken.

PRIVACY POLICY
- Forests need protecting, and so does your privacy. Participating is 100% privacy-safe and completely anonymous.
- Profile data pseudonymised and securely stored with bank-level encryption
- We never sell your Personal Identifiable Information
- The app complies with CCPA & GDPR
- You are in control: Opt-out at any time.

SUPPORT
- If you have questions, please check the FAQ for questions about payments, winner announcements, new surveys available, or how the point system works.
- In case of technical problems or to submit suggestions and ideas, send us an email 💬 at support@beatplus.com 📧
- Use support platform https://support.jaggerapp.com/hc/en-us

- It’s fun, it pays, and it’s 100% free to join
- Participate in online surveys and earn rewards, like gift cards and coupons
- Our brand partners will pay for anonymised survey, opinion & poll data
- Earn rewards while planting trees (1 survey = 1 tree) / Grow your own forest!
- Plant a tree and help the planet by actively stopping deforestation and rebuilding natural ecosystems
- Win & Earn: You get rewards from polls, surveys & advertising studies, and we contribute to a better and greener world
-----
HOW IT WORKS
1) Download the app & fill out your profile to qualify
2) Participate in short surveys & polls for Jagger Coins
3) Convert your Jagger Coins into Amazon vouchers and many other gift cards
4) We reinvest the profit into planting trees

FEATURES
- Fetching available paid surveys every minute
- Earn Jagger Coins from surveys & polls
- Convert Jagger Coins into gift cards

MY JAGGER COINS
- Amazon gift card
- Xbox gift card
- Netflix gift card
- Google Play gift card
- iTunes gift card
- And many other retailers…
- Paypal credit (COMING SOON)
-----
REWARDS GROW ON TREES
Jagger is not only a survey app, it’s a transparent global initiative trusted by the world’s biggest brands (Google, Mars, McDonald’s, Gilette, Pepsi, Warner Bros, Pampers, or Specsavers among many others). Global brands believe in Jagger and quality users like YOURSELF, to learn about your TV, radio, and outdoor advertising preferences.
By joining Jagger's green journey through paid surveys, you'll be able to become a "tree advocate"!

EARN A REWARD & PLANT A TREE
→ Our ultimate goal is to plant 100 million trees in the next 5 years.
→ We want to make the world a GREENER PLACE by creating solutions that inspire other companies to change how they operate.
→ We decided to be the first to bring an altruistic and genuinely caring side to the survey and rewards app industry.
→ With the desire to be seen by users as more than the typical money, cash, rewards, gift cards, coupons, and easy PayPal cashout app. With Jagger, we chose to create a platform that allows YOU to make the world a green and eco-friendly place by planting a tree for every survey taken.

PRIVACY POLICY
- Forests need protection, and so does your privacy: participating is 100% privacy-compliant, safe, and completely anonymous.
- Profile data pseudonymised and securely stored with bank-level encryption
- We never sell your Personal Identifiable Information
- The app complies with CCPA & GDPR
- You are in control: Opt-out at any time.

SUPPORT
- If you have questions, please check the FAQ for questions about payments, winner announcements, new surveys available, or how the point system works.
- In case of technical problems or to submit suggestions and ideas, send us an email 💬 at support@beatplus.com 📧
- Use the support platform https://support.jaggerapp.com/hc/en-us

Join us and start taking surveys and planting trees right now!

creator: Beat+
descriptionHtml:
Want to earn rewards and make the world a greener place?

Join Jagger and binge-watch your favorite shows, movies, and video content on TV and YouTube to earn Bronze, Silver, and Gold tickets for a chance to win daily prize draws of up to $10 and up to $100 on Sundays.

Hungry for more rewards? Take paid surveys and polls to earn some more cash and money rewards that you can then cash out for gift cards from your favorite brands.

...And the best part? For every survey you take, Jagger plants a tree to help fight deforestation and rebuild natural ecosystems. By joining Jagger, you will be making a positive impact on developing countries with deforestation challenges.

Download today, earn rewards, and plant trees while having fun.

HOW IT WORKS
1) Download Jagger & complete your profile to start earning rewards.
2) Turn Media Research on to join TV and YouTube studies. With Media Research you can boost your earnings by up to x2 for every survey you take, while also receiving XP to earn Bronze, Silver, and Gold tickets. The longer you keep Media Research on, the more you win!
3) Participate in short surveys & polls for more rewards (Jagger coins).
4) Convert your Jagger coins into gift cards (Amazon gift cards, Spotify gift cards, Netflix gift cards, Nike gift cards...).
5) Jagger reinvests the profit into planting trees, which is why survey = 1 tree.

Get high XP and win big, with Bronze, Silver, or Gold prize draw tickets. The higher the ticket, the greater the rewards, you can earn up to $100.

b) Prize Draw: Check what your XP is and get a ticket to paradise with Jagger's highly-paid daily prize draws.
2) My Profile: Complete your profile questions to earn rewards (Jagger coins) and unblock new polls and paid surveys.
3) My Surveys: take paid surveys and fun polls to earn more rewards through Jagger coins which you can then redeem through highly-paid gift cards.
4) Shop: Convert Jagger coins into up to $20 and $50 gift cards from your favorite brands.
5) Transactions: Check your balance and transactions.

MONEY DOES GROW ON TREES

descriptionHtml:
Earning rewards, gift cards, and helping to make the planet a greener place? The answer is Jagger – the paid survey app that is revolutionizing the market research industry.

WHAT JAGGER BRINGS YOU – GET READY FOR A LEAF-TASTIC EXPERIENCE

- Binge-watch your favorite shows, movies, and video content on TV and YouTube
- Earn Bronze, Silver, and Gold tickets for a chance to win big weekly prize draws of up to £100.
- Hungry for more rewards? Take paid surveys and polls, earn Jagger coins and convert them for gift cards from your favorite brands.
- And the best part? For every survey you take, Jagger plants a tree to help fight deforestation and rebuild natural ecosystems. By joining Jagger, you will be making a positive impact on developing countries with deforestation challenges.

So what are you waiting for? It's easy to join, so download Jagger today, earn rewards, and plant trees while having fun.

HOW IT WORKS
1) Download Jagger & complete your profile to start earning rewards.
2) Turn Media Research on to join TV and YouTube studies. With Media Research you can boost your earnings by up to x2 for every survey you take, while also receiving XP to earn Bronze, Silver, and Gold tickets. The longer you keep Media Research on, the more you win!
3) Participate in short surveys & polls for more rewards (Jagger coins).
4) Convert your Jagger coins into gift cards (Amazon gift cards, Spotify gift cards, Netflix gift cards, Nike gift cards, and more).
5) Jagger reinvests the profit into planting trees, which is why 1 survey = 1 tree.

FEATURES & SUBFEATURES
1) Media Research: Get high XP and win big, with Bronze, Silver, or Gold prize draw tickets. The higher the ticket, the greater the rewards, you can earn up to £100.
a) Survey Boost: Check the bonus rewards you receive for a substantial increase in every survey you complete.
b) Prize Draw: Check what your XP is and get a ticket to paradise with Jagger's highly-paid weekly prize draws.
2) My Profile: Complete your profile questions to earn rewards (Jagger coins) and unblock new polls and paid surveys.
3) My Surveys: take paid surveys and fun polls to earn more rewards through Jagger coins, which you can then redeem through highly-paid gift cards.
4) Shop: Convert Jagger coins into up to £20 and £50 gift cards from your favorite brands.
5) Transactions: Check your balance and transactions.

MONEY DOES GROW ON TREES
Jagger is trusted by the world's biggest brands (Google, McDonald's, Warner Bros, and more) for media market research studies. Join Jagger's green journey and become a ""tree advocate"" while earning big rewards through fun media research studies, polls, and paid surveys.

EARN A REWARD & PLANT A TREE - OUR MISSION
- Jagger's ultimate goal is to plant 100 million trees in the next 5 years.
- We want to make the world a GREENER PLACE by creating solutions that inspire other companies to change how they operate.
- Jagger is the first to bring a charitable and genuinely caring side to the media market research apps with rewards and surveys.
- With the desire to be seen by users as more than the typical rewards, gift cards, coupons, easy PayPal cashout, and paid survey app, Jagger was created as a platform that gives YOU the power to make the world a green and eco-friendly place by planting 1 tree for every paid survey you take.

PRIVACY POLICY
- Pseudonymized profile data securely stored.
- Safe and secure research matching through 'fingerprints'.
- CCPA & GDPR-compliant.
- Opt out anytime.

SUPPORT
- If you have questions, please check Jagger's in-app FAQ.
- In case of technical problems or to submit suggestions and ideas, email us at support@beatplus.com

title:

1.16.5

creator: Beat+
descriptionHtml:
Welcome to Jagger, the app that values your opinions and rewards you for voicing them with gift cards and prize draws. Engage in diverse polls and short surveys covering a spectrum of topics, from your favorite brands to the latest trends in sports, food, fashion, and more. With each set of polls, contribute to planting trees in regions like Nepal, Indonesia, Madagascar, Haiti, Kenya, and Central America, nurturing a greener planet for generations to come.

How it works:
By participating in surveys, polls, and optional passive media research, you earn valuable XP and coins that can be redeemed for exciting gift cards and exclusive rewards in our shop. Additionally, your accumulated XP unlocks the opportunity to win various prize draws, amplifying your earning potential and impact on reforestation initiatives globally.

Key Features:
Polls & Surveys: Voice your opinions on diverse subjects and see how your feedback stacks up in the community.
Impactful Contributions: Join the Jagger community and contribute to the environment by planting trees with every survey, fostering a greener world for future generations.
Rewards & Gift Cards: Redeem your hard-earned coins and points for a range of exciting gift cards and exclusive rewards in our shop from your favorite brands.

Why Download Jagger:
- Jagger's ultimate goal is to plant 1 million trees in the next 5 years.
- We want to make the world a greener place by creating solutions that inspire other companies to change how they operate.
- Jagger is the first to bring a charitable and genuinely caring side to the media market research apps with polls, surveys, and rewards.
- With the desire to be seen by users as more than the typical paid survey and gift cards app, Jagger was created as a platform that gives you the power to make the world a green and eco-friendly place by planting 1 tree for every survey or set of polls you take.

Download Jagger now and embark on a journey to make a difference while enjoying the perks of valuable rewards and gift cards. Join a community of like-minded individuals committed to making a positive impact, driven by the power of collective voices. Let your voice be heard and your actions count toward a greener, brighter future.

Your Privacy Matters
We care about keeping your information safe so we prioritize your information's security, ensuring it remains confidential by adhering to strict regulations such as CCPA and GDPR. You can opt out anytime, ensuring complete control over your personal information.

Join Jagger now to start earning rewards, sharing your opinions, and contributing to a greener future for generations to come. For any inquiries or support, explore the in-app FAQ or contact us via email at support@beatplus.com. Visit our support platform at https://support.jaggerapp.com/hc/en-us to stay connected and informed.
